markdownRemark.html: Data is valuable, particularly when vital to a project. Defend it because it has internal value, regardless of perceived value from others. Don’t give opportunity for others to control vital parts. Make it more trouble than it’s worth.

frontmatter.description: Defend it because it has internal value, regardless of perceived value from others. Don't give opportunity for others to control vital parts. Make it more trouble than it's worth.
frontmatter.title: Defending data
